channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken and missing swings, 30th December
item.description:

item.title: Electrified fence, 30th December
item.description:
An electrified fence has been erected and is blocking the public footpath. We regularly use this footpath and estimate that it has been erected in the last few weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 30th December
item.description:
Customer reports that Virgin Media are due to install a connection to the above location, but keep rescheduling this work. They have been repeatedly assured that a Streetworks permit has been applied for by Virgin. However, the customer suspects that this is not the case and asks if this can be confirmed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 30th December
item.description:
A tree that hangs over the pathway and road, has a split that is over a foot long. The gap at the top of the split is wide enough to put your hand in. It is putting people at risk of injury. The tree is no the grass verge next to the path outside 14 Winterbotham Road
Report on FixMyStreet
